post.body: Yup, someone ripped off the last article I wrote, on mobile forensic tools - posted on blog w/ no credit or link back!
@sShap Thanks... wish I could offer a prize but really I didn't want anyone to think I'd gone nuts. ;)
Burst my bubble, why dontcha! :P
Yeah... I know I could not get 3 of my favorite radio stations in the car (2 from Boston) and figured the same.
This is why we want to move south... buried utilities lines!!
And yep, kids LOVE flashlights! Helps them stay unafraid too.
We should have a genny but we don't. Last big storm knocked out power for 3 days - spent 1 in a hotel and the other at in-laws.
Really - Verizon?? We have a small local company out where we live (the sticks - I couldn't even find a hotspot to go online!)
Not at all. We just crank the oil heat if we think we're going to lose power and pile on the blankets.
The irony was, we got our power back about 8 hours before we got phone/DSL back! 1st time ever in 20 yrs I remember losing phone too.
Unless he has the power to wreak ice storm havoc on entire regions, no. :)
Try a blowdryer yet? That's what we've done in the past.
Oh no Ken! Poor baby. :( How are his parents? Hope all of you feel better very very soon.
I recommend blocking rather than ignoring. Then you only have to deal with them once!
Much luck, Mack!
Wimp.
You gonna let @danmiami taunt you like that??
Do those start to lose their effect after a few times? :)
Is he any relation to the Bloglines Plumber?
Would be interested to see if ppl liked the focused vs. unfocused chat better #journchat
No, this one asked what my photo was doing on ShockingProfiles.com, which wanted me to register... no thanks!
Conversation & building relationships... absolutely! Before it was just grabbing sources from wherever. #journchat
I'm new to #journchat... B2B journo learning about PR (but still writing articles).
Or they are changing/adapting slowly and treating SM like another broadcast tool #journchat
Thanks but this wasn't the Flash player update... this was something different. I'll email you?
W/ expedited shipping? http://tinyurl.com/5p6x4n
Oh please don't tell me that! I have come too close to ankle breaks too many times as it is! LOL
That just sounds unpleasant. Feel better soon, hope you are able to rest!
But only if you yelled at the top of your voice. All cheerleader-like, you know.
But but it's all about the idealism! ;)
Can't DM ya but wanted to say thanks for the great recs on whom to follow! :)
So she's not a crime analyst?
You should have seen the look on my husband's face when THAT picture came up... thanks a lot!! LMAO
And Barack Obama's rally cry was THE SAME AS Bob the Builder's!! Coincidence? Hmmmm...
No, that's you. (You already admitted to being a teenage girl.) I'm stalking @danmiami in hopes of getting someplace warm!! ;D
More likely with B2B reporters (like me) than with news media, though, yes?
Thanks for the link, Linda - but will reporters think to ask or take PR folks up on the offer?
@luby_cfce Dude, I'm just following to be a better LE reporter. That's all! I swear!
Yes. It tweets. Rather spookily, like in "The Birds." But, whatever. :)
Well now that your honey is back in your life, I'm sure she will help distract you?? :)
Happy Birthday hon! Glad you are enjoying your day!
Amen, Jessie! Your priorities are well in hand. :)
Oh that sounds SO nice! Enjoy!!
Simple? I love going for walks, lingering over tea in a coffeehouse. One bf and I played computer games together!
I'm just composing the email to you now, Anna. Thanks!
Now THAT was fun... nearly 24 hours without phone/DSL! Thank goodness for cellular - got 1 interview done even if I could submit nothing...
Movie Sign!!! (Reference? Anyone??)
P1 newsletter showcasing Cisco stuff and not one of Morgan's 12 Seconds made it in?? What's up with that? Oh wait... ;D
Facebook apps are no different than email "jokes", chain ltrs, etc. Often involve just as much guilt. Why do ppl treat them diff'tly?
Unless he's getting permission, he should still not be posting the text...
This is interesting... since I emailed article ripoff guy, he's been posting links to full articles. Still...
Can you join too many social networks? @danschawbel http://tinyurl.com/66zzye
RT @SDWhite Ticked off at candidates and electeds who simply BROADCAST on social media vs. engaging. Worthless. Should we name names?
Anyone know anything about a Facebook trojan referencing a website shockingprofiles.com??
2yo leaves path of destruction. Hubster: "Eventually he'll be NOT 2." Me: "Right. He'll be 3."
Wrapping presents, eating cookies. Life is good. :)
Should reporters turn to PR for job help? http://tinyurl.com/4ze32m
Predicting the unpredictable: http://tinyurl.com/42oh88
RT @AmberCadabra: Starting out in social media? Build on what you already have. http://twurl.nl/ohtmzn
RT @barbchamberlain @BrickandClick Bookmark this: Officers Down Memorial Page (Remembering Law Enforcement Heroes): http://www.odmp.org/
